languages.text: Почтенная сестра Арджента предложила привлечь к борьбе широкие массы лояльного населения планеты. Вдохновленные праведным гневом, ополченцы могли бы провести столь масштабную зачистку джунглей, на которую не способно менее многочисленное войско.

traits.locale_text: Почтенная сестра Арджента предложила привлечь к борьбе широкие массы лояльного населения планеты. Вдохновленные праведным гневом, ополченцы могли бы провести столь масштабную зачистку джунглей, на которую не способно менее многочисленное войско.

languages.text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.
languages.original_text: Почтенная сестра Арджента предложила привлечь к борьбе широкие массы лояльного населения планеты. Вдохновленные праведным гневом, ополченцы могли бы провести столь масштабную зачистку джунглей, на которую не способно менее многочисленное войско.

traits.locale_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

languages.text: 尊敬捧げられしシスター・アルジェンタは、この星の忠誠心篤い住民に広く呼びかけ、戦を援助するよう求めた。住民の義憤に拍車がかかった結果、ごく限られた武装の市民軍では不可能と思われていた規模のジャングル掃討戦を成し遂げた。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

traits.locale_text: 尊敬捧げられしシスター・アルジェンタは、この星の忠誠心篤い住民に広く呼びかけ、戦を援助するよう求めた。住民の義憤に拍車がかかった結果、ごく限られた武装の市民軍では不可能と思われていた規模のジャングル掃討戦を成し遂げた。

languages.text: 德高望重的阿洁塔修女建议征召整颗行星的忠诚民众协助战斗。在正义怒火的驱使下，这些民兵可以对丛林进行大规模的扫荡。像这样的大规模扫荡，是规模有限的正规军绝对做不到的事情。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

traits.locale_text: 德高望重的阿洁塔修女建议征召整颗行星的忠诚民众协助战斗。在正义怒火的驱使下，这些民兵可以对丛林进行大规模的扫荡。像这样的大规模扫荡，是规模有限的正规军绝对做不到的事情。

languages.text: La estimada hermana Argenta sugirió reclutar en masa a los ciudadanos leales del planeta para que ayudasen en la lucha. Espoleados por una furia virtuosa, los milicianos podrían peinar las junglas a un ritmo que una fuerza armada, con todas sus limitaciones, no podría igualar.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

traits.locale_text: La estimada hermana Argenta sugirió reclutar en masa a los ciudadanos leales del planeta para que ayudasen en la lucha. Espoleados por una furia virtuosa, los milicianos podrían peinar las junglas a un ritmo que una fuerza armada, con todas sus limitaciones, no podría igualar.

languages.text: Die geschätzte Schwester Argenta schlug vor, die breite Masse der loyalen Planetenbevölkerung zur Unterstützung im Kampf verpflichten. Von rechtschaffener Wut angetrieben, könnte Miliz im Dschungel Angriffe in einem Umfang durchführen, wie er der limitierteren Armee nicht möglich wäre.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

traits.locale_text: Die geschätzte Schwester Argenta schlug vor, die breite Masse der loyalen Planetenbevölkerung zur Unterstützung im Kampf verpflichten. Von rechtschaffener Wut angetrieben, könnte Miliz im Dschungel Angriffe in einem Umfang durchführen, wie er der limitierteren Armee nicht möglich wäre.

languages.text: L'estimée sœur Argenta suggéra de mobiliser en masse la population loyale de la planète pour profiter de son soutien au combat. Mus par une juste colère, ces miliciens pourraient ratisser la jungle à une échelle impossible pour des forces armées plus limitées.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

traits.locale_text: L'estimée sœur Argenta suggéra de mobiliser en masse la population loyale de la planète pour profiter de son soutien au combat. Mus par une juste colère, ces miliciens pourraient ratisser la jungle à une échelle impossible pour des forces armées plus limitées.

languages.text: Saygıdeğer Rahibe Argenta, gezegendeki sadık kitlelerin görevlendirilmesini teklif etti. Haklı bir gerekçeyle feveran eden milis kuvvetleri, daha kısıtlı kolluk kuvvetlerinin asla başaramayacağı büyüklükte orman kuşatmaları başlattı.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Sister Argenta suggested enlisting the broad masses of the planet's loyal population to aid in the fight. Spurred on by righteous anger, militia could carry out sweeps of the jungles on a scale that would be impossible for the more limited armed forces.

traits.locale_text: Saygıdeğer Rahibe Argenta, gezegendeki sadık kitlelerin görevlendirilmesini teklif etti. Haklı bir gerekçeyle feveran eden milis kuvvetleri, daha kısıtlı kolluk kuvvetlerinin asla başaramayacağı büyüklükte orman kuşatmaları başlattı.
